modShortDescription: This mod adds better loot to cars and cars will now respawn! No more tires on the ground 60 min respawn. This is a completely new mod that will be updated.
modDescription:
This mod adds better [loot](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-loot/) to cars and some [vehicles](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-vehicles/)(cars, trucks and busses) will now [respawn](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-respawn/)! No more tires on the ground 30 min respawn.

This is a completely new mod that will be updated frequently.

**Full sedan:**

* Hub Cap
* Head Light
* Door
* Hood
* Trunk
* Keys
* Mirror
* Radio
* Wipers

**Half way sedan:**

* Air Filter
* Radiator
* Vehicle Wheels
* Car Seats

**Bare sedan:**

* Car Battery
* Engine
* Axle
* Chassis
* Frame
* Muffler
* Rim
* Transmission

**Future Updates**  
Welding Goggles Better Loot from cars  
Upgrade respawn cars to any drive-able vehicle.  
Collect gas from cars. Siphoning

**[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/4podr8k35etpay2/Car_Mech_Mod_18.2_B5_V15.zip/file)** 18.2 b5 v15  
**[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/1l4ax96m9uqocgc/Car_Mech_Mod_18.3_B3_V56.zip/file)** 18.3 b3 v56

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/16330-car-mechanic-mod/).

**Credits:** [Nioton6](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/nioton6/)
